Test.Name: Correct response: single SearchDomain
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - SEARCHDOMAIN test when DUT return correct response (single SearchDomain).
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.2.5 NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - SEARCHDOMAIN
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that original DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Set DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that FromDHCP is false STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Search Domains STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validate SearchDomain value Expected: single domain.name value, actual: Array of 1 elements {domain.name} STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Restore DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Correct response: several SearchDomains

Test.Name: Wrong response: several wrong SearchDomains
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - SEARCHDOMAIN test when DUT return wrong response (several wrong SearchDomains).
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.2.5 NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - SEARCHDOMAIN
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that original DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Set DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that FromDHCP is false STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Search Domains STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validate SearchDomain value Expected: single domain.name value, actual: Array of 3 elements {SearchDomain1, SearchDomain2, SearchDomain3} SearchDomain does not equal to the value was set. STEP FAILED
STEP 8 - Restore DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
